title: Scheduled Maintenance
message: E-Leak will be undergoing scheduled maintenance on Aug 5th from 2 AM to 3 AM UTC. Access might be temporarily limited.

title: New Feature: Custom Video Player!
message: We've launched a new video player for M3U8 streams with enhanced controls. Check it out!

title: Welcome to E-Leak Updates!
message: Stay tuned here for the latest news and updates regarding the E-Leak platform.
